description.jp: 邪悪な思念に囚われた 黒き甲冑の男。クリスタルを奪うためにバロン軍を裏であやつり セシルの盟友カインを洗脳するなど 数々の卑劣な手段で一行を苦しめた。彼自身をあやつっていた思念から解放された後は 贖罪のため弟であるセシルの道を切り拓く。
description.gl: A man clad in black armor, prisoner to wicked thoughts. In order to gain control of the Crystals, he manipulated the Baron army from the shadows and brainwashed Kain, causing Cecil and his allies to suffer through countless acts of cruelty. After he is freed from the evil possessing him, Golbez atones for his actions by hewing a path for his younger brother Cecil.

jp.text: 一緒に行かせてはもらえませんか？
しばらく大人しくしていてもらおう！
この戦い 私自身が決着をつける！

gl.text: Might you permit me to accompany you?
I have no business with you、 old man.
I will put an end to all of this.

desc.en:
Dark melee BRV attack (60)
+ Dark magic BRV attack + HP attack (60)
Self: 4 turns 1 level [Shadow Dragon] (limit 3)

While [Shadow Dragon II] is active 
- [Rising Wave] becomes [Rising Wave+]
　∟ Adds 1-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack from Shadow Dragon (40)

While [Shadow Dragon III] is active 
- [Rising Wave] becomes [Rising Wave++]
　∟ Becomes 2-HIT Dark melee BRV attack (40x2)
   + 2-HIT Dark magic BRV attack + HP attack (40x2)
　∟ Adds 2-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack from Shadow Dragon (60x2)
　∟ Does not grant [Shadow Dragon]

While [Shadow Dragon] is active  
- [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ 1-HIT Dark magic BRV attack (80)
 + 1-HIT Dark melee BRV attack from Shadow Dragon (40)

[Shadow Dragon I~III]
- Raises MAX BRV, ATK by 10/20/30%

desc.en:
5-HIT Dark AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice (30x5 + 50x5)
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Self: 6 turns 3 levels [Shadow Dragon]
All targets: 4 turns [Dark Resist Down] on first HP attack

While [Shadow Dragon] is active  
- [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
desc.gl:
5-hit group Dark magic BRV attack + group HP attack
All targets: 4 turns Dark Resist Down
Another 5-hit group Dark magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns 3 levels of Shadow Dragon (limit 3)
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon active
desc.jp:
5HIT闇属性全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃の後
対象に4ACTION「闇耐性ダウン」付与し
さらに5HIT闇属性全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に6ACTION「黒竜」3段階付与（上限3）
「黒竜」付与中 通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
